GAG
El Gestor de Arranque Grafico
Choose an option (1-5)
1: Read instructions
2: Read FAQ
3: Read license
4: Install GAG
M: Previous page  RETURN: next page  Space: Main menu
Choose your keyboard type (1-5)
1: QWERTY (Nearly all the World)
2: AZERTY (Mainly France)
3: QWERTZ (Mainly Germany)
Error while reading disk
Choose your language (1-9,A-Z)
2: Bable
3: Portugues Brazil
4: Catalan
5: Czech
6: Dansk
8: English
9: Francais
A: Galego
B: Deutch
C: Nagyar
D: Italiano
E: Japanese
F: Norsk
G: Polski
H: Portugues
I: Espanol
J: Svenska
0: Return
6: Return
Remember: I will NOT answer questions that can be solved reading
the FAQ or the instructions. Those e-mails will go to the trash.
Press any key to continue
5: Uninstall GAG (Restores MBR)
Are you sure you want to uninstall GAG? (Press 1 for yes or 0 for no)
GAG uninstalled. Press a key to return to main menu.
K: Turkce
4: DVORAK
7: Nederlands
1: Russian
5: Cyrillic (use it with Rusian language only)
L: Euskera
Can't uninstall. Check the FAQ.
M: Suomen
